front.title: A Provisioning Protocol for ENUM-SIP Addressing Servers

abstract.t: This document defines a provisioning protocol for ENUM-SIP addressing servers. This protocol has been recently published as part of CableLabs(r) PacketCable(tm) specifications. It allows SIP service providers to provision and manage session establishment data used by SIP network elements to route SIP sessions to the target destinations which may be served by the SIP service provider's own internal network or by a session peering partner. The data provisioned into an ENUM-SIP addressing server is queried by SIP entities using ENUM or SIP.
